about_the_game:
We present a design application for generating effects and creating installations using household and laser projectors.
You can create installations based on uploaded videos, photos and embedded 3D models.
Divide the screen into multiple mini-screens by drawing the outlines of real objects. Add your own video footage to every user screen.
Customize the appearance, properties and characteristics of 3D models - their shape, color and behavior using fade-in and fade-out triggers.
Customize the interaction of screens and 3D models, creating unique colorful installations on the walls of rooms and houses.
Use the program's capabilities to create 3D presentations...

short_description: An application for creating installations using household or laser projectors. Divide the screen into many mini-screens, outlining the contours of real objects, add your videos and photos to them. Use built-in 3D models, effects and combinations thereof. Create a fairy tale on the wall!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
